name: Bore supply
description: BORE is an on-chain mining protocol and strategy game built on BNB Chain Players compete in fast-paced rounds by deploying BNB across a 7Ã—3 grid of 21 validators, a layout inspired by the 21 core validators (Cabinet) that secure BNB Chain. New $BORE tokens are minted and distributed to miners on the winning validator, while BNB deployed on losing validators is redistributed to winners. In parallel, a Motherlode pool and a refining mechanism reward longer-term and more patient miners, and a staking system allows holders to benefit from protocol revenue via buybacks. Design Goals Fair & transparent One winning validator is chosen using a verifiable random function oracle on BNB Chain (Binance VRF). Simple, capped tokenomics Fixed maximum supply, no insider/team allocation, and programmatic emissions. Aligned incentives Active miners earn $BORE and BNB, long-term holders benefit from refining and buyback-driven staking rewards.
